query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'promotion_codes';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49rQA9eTW5K3aEQ.root --database bwb5QLDJGEKZppJnjPFZwE --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'promotion_codes';
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	IS_NULLABLE
id	int	NO
code	varchar	NO
status	enum	NO
usedByAccountId	int	YES
usedByAccountType	enum	YES
usedByEmail	varchar	YES
usedAt	timestamp	YES
creditsBefore	int	YES
creditsAfter	int	YES
createdAt	timestamp	NO
updatedAt	timestamp	NO
